scripts.local: cross-env NODE_ENV=local PORT=4000 pm2 start ./bin/www --name 'GA Potal Admin' --watch
scripts.development: cross-env NODE_ENV=development PORT=4101 pm2 start ./bin/www --name 'GA Potal Admin'
scripts.production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production PORT=4101 pm2 start ./bin/www --name 'GA Potal Admin'
